html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-07922023-08-04GAC
ActJustice for Victims of Corrupt Foreign Officials Act (Sergei Magnitsky Law)
SubjectRegulations Amending the Justice for Victims of Corrupt Foreign Officials Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the JUSTICE FOR VICTIMS OF CORRUPT FOREIGN OFFICIALS REGULATIONS in order to add three (3) individuals to the Schedule of the Regulations, ending their impunity and rendering them inadmissible to Canada unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0179 Publication Date: 2023-08-16
AttachmentsAttachment
act: Justice for Victims of Corrupt Foreign Officials Act (Sergei Magnitsky Law)
subject: Regulations Amending the Justice for Victims of Corrupt Foreign Officials Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the JUSTICE FOR VICTIMS OF CORRUPT FOREIGN OFFICIALS REGULATIONS in order to add three (3) individuals to the Schedule of the Regulations, ending their impunity and rendering them inadmissible to Canada unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs.
